requirements.summary: Update the fallback/default balance value in the useBalance hook from 1000 to 211239 so that the UI reflects the correct default when no backend data is available
acceptanceCriteria: The useBalance hook returns 211239 as the default value when no balance data has been fetched yet.
The dashboard and balance card display 211,239 as the starting balance for new users.

file_operations.description: Change the default balance value returned by the useBalance hook from 1000 (representing $10.00) to 211239 (representing $2,112.39). Update the fallback value in the hook's return statement to ensure that when no balance data is available from the backend, the UI displays 211,239 as the starting balance.
